xml.metadata:
xnbData: target: "w" compressed: true hiDef: true readerData: - type: "Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Content.DictionaryReader`2[[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089],[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]]" version: 0
- type: "Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Content.StringReader" version: 0
numSharedResources: 0
content: #!Dictionary<String,String>
xml.p: Rainy_Day_0: "I hope Jas and Marnie are doing alright without me.#$e#I'm not too worried... Jas is old enough now to take care of the animals on her own." #!String
Rainy_Day_1: "You know what? I think I've lost some weight since moving in with you.$6" #!String
Rainy_Day_2: "Here... take this.[346 174 303 305 215]#$e#I bought some of those a while ago and they're almost expired..." #!String
Rainy_Day_3: "Buhh... I don't feel like being productive today." #!String
Rainy_Day_4: "@, should I do something useful today?... or just nap forever?" #!String

Rainy_Night_0: "Hmm... seems like a good night to microwave a few pizza rolls.#$e#Some people like to cook them in the oven, but it just takes too long for me. Plus I like that squishy texture.$h" #!String
patio_Shane: "Charlie's doing well.$8" #!String
Rainy_Night_1: "The tip-tappa-tip of the rain takes me to a different time... a different place." #!String
Rainy_Night_2: "I guess... if I had some pants I might've gone outside today... but, nah." #!String
Rainy_Night_3: "I like gloomy weather, but I feel kinda bad for the hens." #!String
Rainy_Night_4: "Tip-tappa-tip-tappa-tip... I'm starting to feel thirsty.$6" #!String
Indoor_Day_0: "Buh... sometimes life feels like a slow, gray blur... know what I mean?" #!String
Indoor_Day_1: "Hey. Take this... I put a bit too much in the microwave. [195 215 206]#$e#Sorry if it's squishy." #!String
Indoor_Day_2: "Do me a favor... when I pass away, use my dust to fertilize some corn for the hens." #!String
Indoor_Day_3: "*smooch*... Mmm, it tastes like someone's been nibbling on pizza rolls.$6" #!String
Indoor_Day_4: "I may keep to myself a lot, and I may seem unhappy sometimes... but I do appreciate all the work you do. I'm a lucky guy.$6" #!String
Indoor_Night_0: "I'm just gonna have a couple more beers before closing my eyes for the night." #!String
Indoor_Night_1: "If... If only... ah, I was just thinking back on the glory days, when I played gridball on the varsity team.$6#$b#Now I'm old and weak, though..." #!String
Indoor_Night_2: "Ughh... *gurgle*... I feel a little bloated... oof... too much Joja all-purpose dipping sauce." #!String
Indoor_Night_3: "Buh... I wish I was six inches taller and a whole lot smarter...#$e#You like me for who I am? I still have a hard time understanding that..." #!String
Indoor_Night_4: "I spent all day watching TV and now my legs feel like soft dough. Guess I'll have to take it easy until tomorrow." #!String
Outdoor_0: "I didn't sleep well last night so I'm hoping this fresh air will get the juices flowing.#$e#What juices, you ask? Heh... you're weird.$h" #!String
Outdoor_1: "Sometimes I stop and realize that I'm nothing more than a bag of juicy, squishy flesh.#$e#But hey... that's just fine... what's life, anyway?$h" #!String
Outdoor_2: "When I stop and think about it... I'm in a good place. My life is pretty nice.$6" #!String
Outdoor_3: "Ooohh... my tongue is swollen from eating too many pepper poppers.$s" #!String
Outdoor_4: "Hey, @. You were sleeping like a baby so I slipped out of bed and went for a morning walk around the farm. Everything looks fine." #!String
OneKid_0: "It's weird, when I was younger I swore I'd never have a kid. I wonder what happened to me?$6" #!String
OneKid_1: "Let's make sure to give %kid1 lots of eggs... Baby's gotta grow those legs!" #!String
OneKid_3: "Papa Shane reporting for duty...$6#$e#Buh... I've become corny in my old age." #!String
TwoKids_0: "I already fed the kids two bowls of pizza puffs cereal. They'll be full for a while." #!String
TwoKids_1: "I'll be honest... two kids is enough for me." #!String
TwoKids_2: "Ugh... %kid2 is being a little brat today. Must've gotten that from me..." #!String
TwoKids_3: "*Sigh*... If only we could send the kids off to Joja work-camp for a season...#$e#I'm just kidding.$h" #!String
Good_0: "*Sniff*... *sniff*... mmm... what's that wonderful fragrance you're wearing? Eau de pepperoni?$6" #!String
Good_1: "You're a lot better-looking than me, you know that?$h" #!String
Good_2: "The name 'Shane' means 'Gift from Yoba'... What a joke." #!String
Good_3: "I'm in a great mood today... The Tunnelers won big last night.$h" #!String
Good_4: "Hey, if I ever seem cranky, just ignore it. I get in weird moods sometimes, but it's not about you... okay?" #!String
Good_5: "Ah... life on the farm sure beats working at Joja. That place was disgusting.$h#$e#You think it was depressing out front? Kid, you should've seen the back room..." #!String
Good_6: "Ah... this is the life. No responsibilities, Tunnelers game tonight, fridge stocked with all the goodies a guy could need.$h" #!String
Good_8: "I don't really feel like doing work today. Maybe I'll see what's on TV." #!String
Good_9: "Huh... You're wondering why I have this goofy grin on my face? You really have a short memory span, don't you? *blush*$h" #!String
Neutral_0: "Oh, do you need something from me? Sorry, I'm kind of busy at the moment." #!String
Neutral_2: "Why don't you tell me about your day when we're in bed tonight? I'm kind of busy right now..." #!String
Neutral_3: "Working at Joja was a drag, but at least I got to interact with people occasionally." #!String
Neutral_4: "What, you want me to clean the dishes? I'll do it... eventually..." #!String
Neutral_5: "Are we doing okay on money? I don't want to have to go back to work at Joja." #!String
Neutral_6: "If you need to go see your friends in town, go ahead. I'm happy in the company of the TV and a couple of tall boys." #!String
Neutral_8: "Ugh... clean, clean, clean. Sweep, sweep, sweep. Bathe. Cook. Make the bed... Oh, well. Life's alright." #!String
Bad_5: "Look, I just want to be alone. Why don't you go outside and do your own thing for a while?" #!String
Bad_6: "What do you want? You sound like Marnie on one of her bad days. Go away.$a" #!String
Bad_7: "Farm-life is actually really boring. What am I doing here?$s" #!String
Bad_8: "Yeah... *hic* ... Sure, honey. Whatever you say... *hic*" #!String
funLeave_Shane: "I'm going to go out today, alright?" #!String
funReturn_Shane: "Sorry if I'm sweaty... That was quite a walk... Buh, I'm out of shape.$6" #!String
spring_1: "Ooo... my throbbing head. How many did I have last night?" #!String
spring_12: "The egg festival is probably my favorite... you know how I am, I go crazy for anything to do with chickens.$h" #!String
spring_23: "Oh, right. It's the flower dance tomorrow. Hey, if it makes you happy, I'm happy." #!String
summer_1: "I like seeing all the tropical plants this time of year. The valley gets so lush." #!String
summer_10: "I might fast until the luau tomorrow. I need the ol' bag to be empty so I can fill it with piping hot soup.$h" #!String
summer_27: "What are your plans for the fall? I'm going to try and incorporate more wine into my diet." #!String
fall_1: "Hmm... I might have to buy a few cases of pumpkin ale to celebrate the season...$6" #!String
fall_15: "I'll be helping Marnie with the animals at tomorrow's fair, like usual. You should just kick back and have some fun.$6" #!String
fall_17: "I'm starting to really feel my age... and I'm not comfortable with that at all." #!String
winter_1: "Any big plans this winter? I'll probably end up watching a lot of TV and just hanging out around the house." #!String
winter_28: "Well, another year gone by... I look a little older, but that's about all.$6" #!String
